title: Death threat targeting Jane Doe near Acme HQ in San Francisco, CA
content: Investigators flagged a death threat mentioning Jane Doe and plans near Acme HQ in San Francisco, CA tomorrow at 7pm.

title: Protest march and blockade announced near Acme NYC Office
content: Organizers announced a protest march and blockade near Acme NYC Office next week.

title: Travel advisory and curfew issued for destination city
content: A travel advisory and nightly curfew were issued for San Francisco due to unrest and strike activity.

title: Doxxing campaign references executive residence
content: Posts indicate doxxing of the CEO and mention route access details near residence.
